short_summary: Replace washroom roof and address inlet water issues
description: Parks Canada has issued a formal invitation to vendor(s) to provide bids for the remediation of an existing washroom facility to address ongoing water-related ingress issues and subsequent water damage. Work includes removal and replacement of the existing standing-seam metal roof system/assembly and modifications/repairs to interior and exterior wall assemblies. Value estimated between $500,001 and $1,000,000. Project will be completed by October 31st 2023.

## Invitation to Qualify
### Description
Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the Stage 1 – Washroom Roof Replacement – Rogers Pass National Historic Site project. The project involves remediation of an existing washroom facility to address ongoing water-related ingress issues.

#### Bid Requirements
- The contractor must have experience in roofing services.
- The project is estimated to be valued between $500,001 and $1,000,000.
- The work must be completed by October 31, 2023.

#### Submission Requirements
- To submit a bid, contractors must register on the Government of Canada tendering service at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities>.
- Bids submitted by email or fax should be directed to the address specified above in the Contact Information section below.
- Multiple attachments are accepted.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language.

#### Important Notes
- Bids are accepted until May 29, 2023, at 4:00 pm EST.
- Parks Canada requires compliance with the National Parks Regulations and other relevant laws.
- Contractors are requested to base their bids on documents obtained from the Government of Canada tendering service.

### Technical Information
- The project involves the removal and replacement of the existing standing-seam metal roof system/assembly and modifications/repairs to interior and exterior wall assemblies.
- Water-damaged building systems need to be remediated.

### Selection Criteria
There are no specific selection criteria for this stage.

### Period of Contract and Delivery
The contractor must perform and complete the work by October 31, 2023.

### Enquiries
Technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least 5 business days prior to the closing date.

### Contact Information
